title: Software Applications
description: Software used by the principal investigator(s) to collect or analyze data, required to understand how the data were obtained or to reproduce results.

name.title: Software Name
name.description: The name of the software application.

description.title: Software Description
description.description: Short description or overview of the application and its intended purpose
examples: JHOVE, the JSTOR/Harvard Object Validation Environment, is an extensible software framework for performing format identification, validation, and characterization of digital objects.

ffmpeg is a very fast video and audio converter that can also grab from a live audio/video source. It can also convert between arbitrary sample rates and resize video on the fly with a high quality polyphase filter.

programming_languages.title: Programming Languages
programming_languages.description: The programming language(s) used in the development of the application

operating_systems.title: Operating Systems
operating_systems.description: Computer operating systems supported by the application

memory_requirements.title: Memory Requirements
memory_requirements.description: Minimum memory (e.g., RAM) requirements to operate the application
examples: 4 GB of GPU memory for HD and some 4K media; 6 GB or more for 4K and higher

processor_requirements.title: Processor Requirements
processor_requirements.description: Processor architecture required to run the application

software_requirements.title: Software Requirements
software_requirements.description: Required components for the application, like runtime environments and shared libraries not included in the package but needed to run it.
examples: Requires additional Python libraries: numpy, v1.11.2; scipy, v0.18.1, and pandas, v0.19.0

storage_requirements.title: Storage Requirements
storage_requirements.description: Amount of storage space required by the application
examples: 3.5 GB for new installations, 5 GB for upgrades (including temporary files required during installation)
8 GB of available hard-disk space for installation; additional free space required during installation

device_requirements.title: Device Requirements
device_requirements.description: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application

license.title: License
license.description: The license associated with the application, preferably expressed as a URL.

download_url.title: Download URL
download_url.description: A direct link to a downloadable software artifact (e.g., executable, package, archive, or single script file) that retrieves the application itself, without additional navigation or instructions.

install_url.title: Installation URL
install_url.description: A link to a repository or project landing page where users can obtain resources and instructions to install the application (as opposed to directly downloading a single file).

examples.name: siegfried
examples.description: Siegfried is a signature-based file format identification tool, implementing the National Archives UK's PRONOM file format signatures; freedesktop.org's MIME-info file format signatures; the Library of Congress's FDD file format signatures (beta); and Wikidata (beta).
